caption.p: Anti-Coagulant activity of M. oleifera extract partitions against N. haje venomData

Legend: Group 1: Mixture of distilled water/citrated plasma (normal control). Group 2: Mixture of venom/citrated plasma (venom control). Group 3: Mixtures of venom/citrated plasma/0.2 mL of polyvalent antivenom. Group 4: Mixture of venom/citrated plasma/300 mg/kg of n-hexane partition. Group 5: Mixture of venom/citrated plasma/600 mg/kg of n-hexane partition. Group 6: Mixture of venom/citrated plasma/300 mg/kg of ethyl acetate partition. Group 7: Mixture of venom/citrated plasma/600 mg/kg of ethyl acetate partition. Group 8: Mixture of venom/citrated plasma/300 mg/kg of Ethanol partition. Group 9: Mixture of venom/citrated plasma/600 mg/kg of Ethanol partition.
are expressed as means ± S.E. of three samples. P < 0.05.
